name: ntutimetable
description:
1. Access Degree Audit via iNTU Student Link - https://sso.wis.ntu.edu.sg/links/ugstudent.html 2. Click on view Course Timetable at the bottom of the page
![View Course Timetable](/images/viewCourseTimetable.png) 3. Copy all the course information as shown below (no need to copy the title)
![Courses](/images/courses.png)
